EmailTemplate.name: Unsubscribe
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. We got the message. We hate to see you go but we've unsubscribed you from future emails. If you have a change of heart, feel free to sign back up on our website at www.yeti.com Please allow 10 business days for the changes to take place.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
